Description:
IN (1) - You have failed to demonstrate that you have effective arrangements as are appropriate, to plan manage and monitor the construction phase to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, construction work is carried out without risks to health and safety, for example the risk of a person falling a distance liable to cause personal injury.
IN (2) - You have failed to demonstrate that your working platforms used for construction work, and from which a person could fall 2 meters or more, are not used in any position unless they have been inspected in that position within the previous 7 days. This is required to ensure that Health and Safety conditions are maintained and that deterioration can be detected and remedied in good time.
PN - You have not taken suitable & sufficient measures to prevent a person falling a distance liable to cause personal injury such as guard rails with a top rail of a minimum of 970mm high and a mid rail with no gaps greater than 470mm.
